attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since schools have started to become academys 'Kick Starts' have been introuduced.These are extra lessions in which children are educated in subjects no use to them or that intrest them, and many do not wish to go yet the school insists that they must.
I would lke the PM and Goverment the abolish these as it only makes children despise school even more.
